headline: Automation, Tech-Forward Solutions Dominate HR Priorities for 2026, Paycom Report Reveals
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, October 23, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, released its annual report on HR trends and priorities, revealing improvements in HR technology as the top priority moving into 2026.
